comments.content: It’s more modern, but [FF Scala](http://web.archive.org/web/20080602061155/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11118.0.0) ( [Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20080602061155/http:/www.fontshop.com/showfont.cfm?fid=FF.11022.0.0)) has Giovanni’s sharp quality and similar proportions.
